## Expected Behavior

A bottom margin of 24px should be applied to the result html of the youtube shortcode.

## Actual Behavior

No bottom margin is applied to the html result of the youtube shortcode.

## Specifications

  - Version: Hugo 0.83.1
  - Platform: Windows
